title: Bakers will love this exclusive bundle from Tala!
content:
Take your bakes to the next level when you purchase the Tala Circular Folding Cooling Rack and Tala Retro Design Round Cake Tins Set from Mahahome. With a grid designed to encourage air flow, the cooling rack will help your cake to set quickly and evenly after removing from the oven – an important step before you begin icing and decorating. And, once ready to store, the transportable cake tins will keep your baked goods fresher for longer, so you can savour every last bite. Sound tempting? There are a limited number of these exclusive bundles available, so make sure you get yours now!

Get bundle now

Note: We negotiate hard to bring you great offers and the best prices in our online deals. We receive a commission from the retailer for each completed purchase and this income helps us to continue to be able to offer you our high-quality content free of charge.

The Tala Circular Folding Cooling Rack has a diameter of 33cm when fully opened and can be folded in half, making it easy to store. It’s also non-stick and dishwasher safe, so cleaning is hassle-free.

The Tala Retro Design Round Cake Tins Set includes three different sized tins made out of metal. They’re bright and colourful as well as being sturdy and robust, which makes them ideal for storing and transporting your cakes. The size specifications of the tins are as follows:

  • Large: 22.5cm diameter x 10cm high
  • Medium: 22cm diameter x 9.5cm high
  • Small: 17cm diameter x 8.5cm High

 

Offer ends 30/04/21. Cannot be used in conjunction with any other discounts or offers.

Get bundle now

author: Steve Newell
